ModMetaData.name: No More Filth
ModMetaData.author: Squirting Elephant
ModMetaData.description:
Prevents all filth in the game, including those added by other mods.
- This mod does NOT impact performance because it ONLY shortly performs work during game startup. - This mod doesn't remove existing filth that you may already have before adding this mod. - Note that firefoam is technically also filth which means that it kills the fire and the foam vanishes instantly afterwards. - Is safe to add/remove from/to an existing game.
